briefTitle: Phase 3 Study of OTO-201 in Acute Otitis Externa
officialTitle: A Prospective, Randomized, Double-Blind, Sham-Controlled, Multicenter, Phase 3 Study of OTO-201 Given as a Single Administration for Treatment of Acute Otitis Externa
summary: This is a prospective, randomized, double-blind, sham-controlled, multicenter, Phase 3 study in which eligible subjects with acute otitis externa (AOE) will be randomized to receive a single administration of either 12 mg OTO-201 or Sham-Control (empty syringe) to the external auditory canal of the affected ear(s).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Considered a Clinical Cure at Day 8
